Package com.taursys.servlet

This package contains components and subcomponents to build servlet based web applications.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DefaultMessageForm Title: Mapper XML Description: Sub-project for Mapper XML support without using XMLC Copyright: Copyright (c) 2001 Company: Taurus Systems
ServletApp ServletApp functions as a main servlet which dispatches requests to registered ServletForms.
ServletForm ServletForm is the base container invoked used by Servlet application.
ServletFormFactory This Factory creates and recycles servlet forms for an application.
ServletInputDispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching Servlet InputEvents.
ServletParameterDispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching Servlet ParameterEvents.
ServletTriggerDispatcher Component responsible for receiving and dispatching Servlet TriggerEvents.
 

Exception Summary
ServletFormNotFoundException ServletFormNotFoundException indicates a requested ServletForm cannot be found.
 

Package com.taursys.servlet Description

This package contains components and subcomponents to build servlet based web applications. These components act as containers for Mapper XML components.

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
